name: Knightbane Manticore
flavor: Olous has unleashed many strange creatures on unsuspecting denizens to test their capabilities.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, if you have a black or red creature, choose an opposing creature, [REST] it, and that creature does not [STAND] during your opponent's next stand step.

name: The Servitor
flavor: The wealthy like their servants docile and meek.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon 1, and [REST] this creature] Choose an opposing creature, [REST] it, and draw a card.

name: Tidechaser Rogue
flavor: Few pirates are as skilled or disciplined as him.

name: The Gardener
flavor: Weeding out anything that is deemed harmful.
ability: [ACT] [Siphon Blue 2] Look at the top card of your opponent's deck, and put it on the top or bottom of their deck. This ability can only be used once per turn.

name: Tidechaser Grunt
flavor: Uh oh.

name: Supreme Ambition
flavor: He will not stop until he has achieved perfection.
ability:
Choose any number of opposing creatures with total ATK equal to or less than the value of one of your blue dice, [REST] them, choose any number of your creatures with total ATK equal to or less than the value of one of your blue dice, and [STAND] them.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into the discard pile, choose an opposing creature, [REST] it, and draw a card.

name: Sabotage
flavor: A vital strike.
ability:
As part of the cost to play this spell, Siphon X. (X must be 1 or more.)
Choose an opposing die, and reduce its value by X.
BLUE@1-2 Change the value of one of your dice to 6, and Siphon X as part of the cost instead.

name: Insignia of Olous
flavor: The uniting symbol for the nations of Olous.

name: Hilda of the Gearmagnus
flavor: The Gearmagnus are a splinter group of dwarves obsessed with the technology of Olous.
ability:
[AUTO] When another creature is summoned, deal 1 damage to it and this creature.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Red)This creature gets +1/-1.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Red)When this creature attacks, deal 1 damage to all opposing creatures.

name: Gearmagnus Saboteur
flavor: Utilizing technology gleaned from Olous, he deploys mines that can be controlled and detonated at will.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, choose an opposing creature, and deal 2 damage to it.

name: Fervent Battlesmith
flavor: She toils day and night to make sure her weapons are up to par.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is [Dragocross](Red), you may change the value of one of your dice to match one of your other red dice, or change the value of one of your red dice to match one of your other dice.

name: Skiving Troop
flavor: Goblins are not very driven individuals, but they can be made to serve.

name: Titanic Force
flavor: When titans collide, eardrums shatter.
ability:
Ambush[②] (You may pay ② to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked and this card is an ambush, choose a creature, and it deals damage to itself equal to its ATK.

name: Standard of Tauris
flavor: Only the strongest warriors are given the honor of being flagbearers of Tauris.

name: Kazzakh, the Hellbent
flavor: No longer concerned with rising in the ranks of demons, he spends his days thinking of ways to torture others.
ability:
[ACT] [Siphon 3] Choose one of your other creatures, and it gets +3/+3 for this turn. At the end of the turn, destroy it, and put it at the fort it was at in REST@. (It does not trigger "when creature is summoned" abilities.)
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Black)When this creature's attack deals damage to a creature or a fort, draw a card for each of your creatures with total ATK and EDR 8 or above. If you drew a card, discard a card from your hand.

name: Cursed-eye Gargoyle
flavor: A piercing gaze.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is destroyed, each player discards a card from their hand.

name: Fender Bender
flavor: Best to cover your ears, now.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is [Dragocross](Black), you may change the value of one of your dice to match one of your other black dice, or change the value of one of your black dice to match one of your other dice.

name: Bewitching Stonegazer
flavor: The more beautiful they are, the more dangerous they tend to be.
ability:
[CONT] This creature gets +1/+0 for each of your red creatures.
[Fort Burst] Summon this creature. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Merciless Punisher
flavor: It takes its time to butcher its enemy, tenderly, almost lovingly, ripping the life out of them.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature deals damage to a fort, you may Siphon 6. If you do, choose one of your opponent's resources, and destroy it.

name: Curse of Niflheim
flavor: A foreboding omen that can be seen throughout Niflheim.
